page.title: 17CONSERVATIVES IN PLAISH
page.content: One aim of this 19 member committee in Cardington & Plaish is to help to return Conservative members at local, national and European elections. We canvass,that is each has a section of the parish community to visit, making sure that voters know the name of the Conservative candidate, the date and place of their polling station,and that they have transport if they are believed to be supporters. The other aim is to raise money to keep the Conservative Office in Shrewsbury in good repair structurally and to help to pay the salary of an agent or secretary.Also money is sent to the Central Conservative office at Westminster. We raise this money by organising social events,such as Cheese & Wine evenings, a Barbecue and Swimming Party,and Coffee Evenings.
